gist.headline: Goals on your screen
gist.blurb: Meet Gen-Wal, a new community app that turns your desktop into a productivity engine with auto-refreshing wallpapers aligned to your goals.
gist.summary: Added Gen-Wal to the community apps directory, a tool for generating focus-enhancing wallpapers.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and use Gen-Wal to boost habits and focus through visual cues on their devices.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy desk setup where the screen is the hero. The bee is customizing a desktop wallpaper that represents 'focus' or 'goals' (maybe a mountain peak or a serene path). The vibe is productive but calm.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot sitting at a desk with a retro computer monitor displaying a beautiful, inspiring mountain landscape wallpaper. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Floating pixel icons of checklists and focus targets. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'GEN-WAL'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
